page.title: 01Landscape Shilbottle Village
page.content: {Sharon Shilbottle is about 1 mile from the colliery houses to the top end of the village. Shilbottle is near the A1 road.It is between the North Sea and Alnwick. The A1 runs from Edinburgh to London.Shilbottle has a lot of surrounding country which can be used for good farming land.Some people have no work to go to.The size of Shilbottle is medium.The shape of Shilbottle is long and straggly. Shilbottles buildings are mostly council houses,the pub,the club, the school,church and shops:the Spar, post office and green hut.The green hut is a little shop at the top end ofthe village which sells sweets, ice-lollys,newspapers and cards.
